short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make notes and sync them. What could be more simple?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make notes and sync them. What could be more simple?

What could be more simple than wanting to create a note whilst browsing the web? Well Simple Notepad allows you to do just that!

In fact Simple Notepad lets you create as many notes as you want. Do you use more than one installation of Chrome?

Then your notes will sync across your different installations using your bookmarks so you'll never have to worry about keeping your notes in sync manually, or wonder what the note said on your other machine, it just happens! 

This Extensions is brought to you by MyBlackmart.com
